He was excellent in both Java and JavaScript development, eventually being drafted out of my team for a company critical project. He is definitely an asset to any team he joins.

I had the privilege to work with Joel at PayPal when he joined my initial "ninja" team to reboot the way the company shifted to a modern approach building and delivering experiences to our customers and then when I hired him at WalmartLabs again as one of the top original engineers to build an application platform from A-Z, we later called Electrode after it was open-sourced. Joel is one of the smartest and most efficient developers I ever met in my entire career. If you think you've met some 10x devs before, wait to work with Joel to recalibrate your eval. His depth of knowledge in so many areas ranging from FE development, CI/CD, automation, to distributed systems with a mix of legacy and new technologies provided my teams and the organization the support and confidence that any project he touched would ship on time. I would hire Joel again without any hesitation, if the opportunity happens to be. Joel, you rock!

received.text: Arunesh is a top developer that I've had the pleasure of working with.  He's one of the best.  His technical skills, dedication, passion for quality and excellence, and openness to collaborate with others make him stand out.  In the past three years he was a huge help for my team by always being the first to adopt new features we release and work with us closely to test and fix issues.  His technical knowledge and a curiosity to get to the bottom of things was instrumental to help shape some of the work we do.

Anurag is a very talented, smart, and driven engineer.  He can quickly learn new technology and problems thrown at him and come up with great solutions.  He always work hard to thoroughly understand any problems and make sure the solution covers all corners.
